description: Tuition is a component of total revenues; ensure totals exceed or equal tuition
Undergraduate headcount should not jump >25% year-over-year without review
Total revenue outliers above 35% YoY require manual validation
12-month FTE should not change by more than 40% year-over-year absent major events
Tuition and fees (net) spikes above 60% YoY usually indicate a mis-map or denominator issue
Warn if provisional and revised releases are mixed within the same panel slice
